projectName.label: Project Name
projectName.description: The primary name for this project.

projectDescription.label: Project Description
projectDescription.description: A short description of the project.

customerName.label: Customer Name
customerName.description: The customer this project is for.

sopDate.label: SOP Date
sopDate.description: The planned start of production date.

targetCost.label: Target Cost (Budget)
targetCost.description: The total target cost or budget for the project.

partName.label: Part Name
partName.description: The unique name or number for the part.

partDescription.label: Part Description
partDescription.description: A short description of the part.

material.label: Material
material.description: The primary material of the part.

partTargetPrice.label: Part Target Price
partTargetPrice.description: The target price per individual part.

targetWeight.label: Target Weight
targetWeight.description: The target weight for one part.

materialCost.label: Material Cost
materialCost.description: Cost of raw materials per part.

processCost.label: Process Cost
processCost.description: Cost of manufacturing processes per part.

amortizationIncluded.label: Amortization in Price
amortizationIncluded.description: Is tooling amortization included in the piece price?

amortizationAmount.label: Embedded Amortization Amount
amortizationAmount.description: The amount of tooling cost added to each piece price.

amortizationPeriod.label: Amortization Period
amortizationPeriod.description: Number of units for tooling amortization.

maintenanceCost.label: Tooling Maintenance Cost
maintenanceCost.description: Ongoing maintenance cost for the tooling.

leadTimeSampleA.label: Lead Time: Sample A
leadTimeSampleA.description: Time to deliver first 'Sample A' parts.

leadTimePPAP.label: Lead Time: PPAP
leadTimePPAP.description: Time to complete the PPAP submission.

leadTimeSOP.label: Lead Time: SOP
leadTimeSOP.description: Time until ready for Start of Production.

leadTimeOffToolParts.label: Lead Time: Off-Tool Parts
leadTimeOffToolParts.description: Time for parts from final production tooling.

leadTimeOffToolOrProcess.label: Lead Time: Off-Tool or Process
leadTimeOffToolOrProcess.description: Time for off-tool or off-process parts.

deliveryLocation.label: Delivery Location
deliveryLocation.description: The final delivery address for the parts.

cartonType.label: Carton Type
cartonType.description: The specified type of carton for packaging.

usesEuroPallet.label: Uses Euro Pallet
usesEuroPallet.description: Are Euro pallets required for shipping?

cleaningRequired.label: Cleaning Required
cleaningRequired.description: Do the parts require a cleaning process?
